sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_01562947db2032005a32f23aaf961971
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.genDoc_Ajax</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>General Document

Leveraged in the ui page Preview document diaglog v2 to provide the editable draft.</description><name>genDoc_Ajax</name><script><![CDATA[var genDoc_Ajax = Class.create();
genDoc_Ajax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDocumentBody : function() {
		var result = '';
		var reset = this.getParameter('sysparm_reset');
		var templateTable = this.getParameter('sysparm_templateTable');
		var templateName = this.getParameter('sysparm_templateName');
		var sourceID = this.getParameter('sysparm_sourceID');
		var sourceTable = this.getParameter('sysparm_sourceTable');
		
		if(reset){
			var gr = new GlideRecord("draft_document");
			gr.addQuery('table', sourceTable);
			gr.addQuery('document', sourceID);
			gr.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID());
			gr.addActiveQuery();
			gr.query();
			while(gr.next()){
				gr.active = false;
				gr.update();
			}
		}
			
			var genDoc = new GeneralDocForm({tableId : sourceID,
			generalDebug : null,
			mode : 'pdf' ,
			targetTable : sourceTable,
			targetId : sourceID,
			templateTable : templateTable,
			template : templateName
		});
		
		return genDoc.body;
	},
	
	setDocumentBody : function() {
		
		var documentBody = this.getParameter('sysparm_documentBody') + '';
		var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name') + '';
		var tableId = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_id') + '';
		var targetTable = this.getParameter('sysparm_targetTable') + '';
		var targetId = this.getParameter('sysparm_targetId') + '';
		
		if (documentBody.trim() != '') {
			var gr = new GlideRecord("draft_document");
			gr.addQuery('table', tableName);
			gr.addQuery('document', tableId);
			gr.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID());
			gr.addActiveQuery();
			gr.query();
			
			if (gr.next() && gr.canWrite()){
				gr.setValue('body', documentBody);
				gr.update();
			} else {
				gr.initialize();
				
				gr.table = tableName;
				gr.document = tableId;
				gr.body = documentBody;
				gr.target_table = targetTable;
				gr.target_id = targetId;
				gr.user = gs.getUserID();
				
				gr.insert();
			}
		}
		return;
	},
	
	
	type: 'genDoc_Ajax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jake.mckenna</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-30 17:43:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>01562947db2032005a32f23aaf961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>genDoc_Ajax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_01562947db2032005a32f23aaf961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jake.mckenna</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-30 17:45:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: admin2017-02-09 20:40:5507eeed5adbfcb200b83c7c4daf9619a50admin2017-02-09 20:40:55truepoTable\n'+ ' \n'+ '\n'+ ' Product Description\n'+ ' Part Number\n'+ ' Qty\n'+ ' Price\n'+ ' Extended\n'+ '\n'+ ''; //now to the parsing var poLine = new GlideRecord('proc_po_item'); poLine.addQuery('purchase_order',current.sys_id); poLine.orderBy('number'); //poLine.addQuery('status','cancelled'); poLine.query(); var subTotal = 0; while(poLine.next()){ subTotal += parseFloat(poLine.cost.getCurrencyValue()); var lines = '\n'+ ' '+poLine.model.getDisplayValue()+'\n'+ ' '+poLine.part_number+'\n'+ ' '+poLine.ordered_quantity+'\n'+ ' '+poLine.cost.getCurrencyDisplayValue()+'\n'+ ' '+poLine.total_cost.getCurrencyDisplayValue()+'\n'+ '\n'; html+= lines; } html += '\n'+ '\n'+ 'SubTotal\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ ' $'+subTotal+'\n'+ ' \n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ 'Shipping Rate\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ ' '+current.ship_rate.getCurrencyDisplayValue()+'\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ ' Grand Total\n'+ '\n'+ '\n'+ ' '+ current.total_cost.getCurrencyDisplayValue()+'\n'+ ' \n'+ '\n'+ '\n'; return html; })(current);]]>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_sig_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_sig_task">u_previewISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_preview" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Pull Draft</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Get the current draft and call it good?
	var gr = new GlideRecord('draft_document');
	gr.addQuery('document',current.u_document_id);
	gr.addActiveQuery();
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		current.u_preview = gr.body;
	}
